projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: My Work
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

orderly.name: Orderly
orderly.description: Created an air traffic control simulation for managing aircraft within controlled airspace, offering a realistic environment for training and understanding air traffic coordination complexities.

bistro_management.name: Bistro Management
bistro_management.description: Developed a restaurant management system with roles for menu, meal, and order management, featuring intuitive ordering and tracking, and GitHub-based collaboration.

aerologic.name: AeroLogic
aerologic.description: Developed an air traffic control simulation for managing aircraft coordination in controlled airspace, providing a realistic training environment.

votesphere.name: VoteSphere
votesphere.description: Developed a mobile app for creating private voting rooms with multi-program voting options, secured by access codes to ensure only authorized participants can join and vote in each session.

fight_game.name: Fight Game
fight_game.description: Check out my Fighting Game project with a Welcome Page, Player Selection, gameplay, and results. Intuitive interface and character options make it a fun experience.

talksphere.name: TalkSphere
talksphere.description: This web application supports 1-to-1 and group chats with user roles like Admin, Moderator, and Normal, each with specific permissions for effective chat control and moderation.
